website_summaries.verdict: A small engine-specific starter fluid that is best used for small equipment and appliances like lawnmowers and snowblowers.
pros: Works for most two and four-cycle combustion engines
Uses a special formula to help start smaller engines with more delicate components
Will help remove corrosion and debris from sensitive parts in a small engine
cons: Doesn't perform well on larger car and truck engines

customer_reviews.title: Just like new. Saved my big $$$$--I thought I either ...
customer_reviews.text: Lawn mower would sputter and "surge". One pull start engine would take forever to start. Thought it was time for a new mower. Read to try this stuff, which I couldn't find at Lowes or Home Depot. Changed the spark plug, got a new air filter, Sprayed into cylinder for 10 seconds. Waited 15 minutes. Started it up. After a huge plume of white smoke dissipated, and it ran perfectly! Starts on 1st pull---no surging. Just like new. Saved my big $$$$--I thought I either had to replace, or take it in to get fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Chalkupanother1

customer_reviews.title: The snow blower ran like a champ
customer_reviews.text: I didn't appreciate the magic of this stuff until it helped clean out a neglected snowblower when it was 15 degrees out. Took out spark plug and sprayed a bunch of this int the hole and waited, and then waited some more. Put the plug back on and in one pull, voila! The snow blower ran like a champ. Please note that if you do this I found that initially the engine will spit out a large purplish-black cloud of frowns, but then clears up. I surmised it was this fluid being burned up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the carb clean and at peak performance.
customer_reviews.text: Purchase in advance of need. Product was previously used by an inboard boat mechanic to get my 1998 inboard running smoothly and to stop the engine from cutting out while throttling up. Worked like a champ, saving me the cost and inconvenience of having the carb rebuilt or replaced. Now use it at the beginning of every boating season to clean out the carb. Tried and true results.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Sr

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Was going to replace my leaf blower as I couldn't get it to start. Tried fresh gas, etc. Decided to give this a try. Emptied the tank of the old, stale gas. Followed the instructions on the can. While I let it sit for 10 minutes(I think that's what it said) I used a brass wire brush to clean the spark plug (you remove the spark plug and spray the B'laster into the SP hole). The leaf blower started up and is still working! Save me 100+/- dollars. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: C. Dysert

customer_reviews.title: Still having mower surging after use
customer_reviews.text: Used on my 5 year old mower that was having an issue with the engine surging. Used as directed (followed the video on the manufacturer's web site) in both the spark plug hole and the air intake. Produced a lot of white smoke, and also caused some dark fluid to leak from the muffler. This eventually cleared up. But alas, the engine is still surging so it did not fix the problem. So I would say this may be worth a shot depending on your situation, just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: to de carbonize valves on a 5 Hp 2-stage air compressor that had been run w/ xs oil and did not provide a good vacuum w/ hand on
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well on BBQ and removes built up carbon. Bought for a friend who repairs 2 & 4 cycle string trimmers, concrete saws, etc. Same friend has used a rust buster, Burlite, to de carbonize valves on a 5 Hp 2-stage air compressor that had been run w/ xs oil and did not provide a good vacuum w/ hand on intake. Rust buster seemed todo a good job though not specified for that job.
customer_reviews.author: crazy white boy

customer_reviews.title: Best TuneUp Spray, doesn’t kill Engine when you spray it.
customer_reviews.text: Best Small engine Tune-Up Spray. Doesn’t kill the engine when you spray it. Often cures engines that have sat idle over the winter season.
customer_reviews.author: Derek J. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: THIS! Is great stuff!!! I wish I had found it YEARS ago! Seemed to double my mower power! (and it's only 4.5 horse!) lol have an old engine... GET THIS!
customer_reviews.author: golfmann

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: When used as directed, this spray sure seems to clean the deposits out of an engine! My old mower started right up, like new!
customer_reviews.author: G. L. Munn

customer_reviews.title: A little in ihe fuel tank. Is a great way to keep any gas engine running smooth.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. It even saved my pickup from having to rebuild the carburetor.
customer_reviews.author: steve rose

customer_reviews.title: DIDN'T LIKE IT
customer_reviews.text: HAD TO TAKE MY MOWER TO THE SHOP AFTHER USE
customer_reviews.author: Broyce R. Mattox

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! Has saved me hundred on tune-ups for my small engines that have sat unused for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: G. Shearer

customer_reviews.title: It fixed it
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed it in according to the directions and then left it on for fifteen minutes when i didn't think it was working I just went on mowing my lawn, by the time I finished the lawnmower was working like new
customer_reviews.author: Tal Blumenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Magic.
customer_reviews.text: It can give kick and start your mower up, but not your love life. Use responsibly.
customer_reviews.author: Senoralitha

customer_reviews.title: This stuff WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff WORKS! I would and HAVE recommended this product to others. It makes whatever motor you spray it into smoke like crazy, but that's a good thing because it means it is cleaning out the crud and other junk. It makes old motors run better, and that's a very good thing!
customer_reviews.author: Cliffgypsy

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this stuff for years on small engines and have always had excellent results.
customer_reviews.author: ExpectingQuality

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on my old echo blower
customer_reviews.text: Had an old echo blower that was difficult to start and keep running. Opened carb and sprayed in while running it makes a lot of smoke but immediately started smoothing out idle. Now runs great.
customer_reviews.author: radio reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Actually did help my old lawn mower start - when ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually did help my old lawn mower start - when I used it (spraying into chamber via spark plug hole after removing plug) copious gray smoke poured out. Tried starting a second time after engined cooled - without spraying more - and it started right up. So effect is durable, unlike other more volatile starter fluids that require repeat applications.
customer_reviews.author: Helveticus

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what kind of magic they put in ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what kind of magic they put in these bottles, but I swear by this stuff. A little spray in the spark plug hole, and a squirt in the air intake will usually crank a dead small motor long enough to get it warmed up and back in shape. They don't sell this locally for me, so I stocked up on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product on all my small engine equipment. Lawnmower, ATV, generator etc. All equipment not used regularly should be stored in accordance with mfg instructions. Starting up with Tune-up really works. I also add some to the fuel once in awhile. Can't hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing the results it gives on small gas engines
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for some time now. It is amazing the results it gives on small gas engines.
customer_reviews.author: PoP

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I used this before starting my 20 year old Honda mower that had been sitting in storage for over 8 years. I wanted to see if it was worth the trouble to rebuild the mower. It started on the 3rd pull without using the choke!
customer_reviews.author: JimA

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Its the best stuff i have ever encountered works well no kidding

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Mower was sputtering - feared carb broken. Used this as directed and it fixed problem immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Current Resident

customer_reviews.title: but the machines are running better.
customer_reviews.text: Did take a while to get. Does make the machines smoke a little bit while its burning off inside. As far as cleaning the inside not sure how much, but the machines are running better.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell.. Did I purchase a quality product?
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully.. so good that my purchasing of a second container will wOrth the expense.

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned out the gunk on the mower, trimmer, ...
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned out the gunk on the mower, trimmer, and blower. Blows a ton of smoke while it is burning it off, but they all start much easier now.
customer_reviews.author: B. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: The best cleaner i've used .
customer_reviews.text: This spray work really great ,toclean the gum out of gas tank's and engine's.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Works every time just follow the directions. Has never let me down.

customer_reviews.title: Read good reviews about this before I bought it and agree ...
customer_reviews.text: smoked out and got my go Kart up and running after having some trouble prior to this. Read good reviews about this before I bought it and agree that this is worth the money. Ended up using it on some other small engines that I had just because. I would purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: bellefant

customer_reviews.title: Works just like it was intended
customer_reviews.text: Works just like it was intended. Great to have in spring season to start all lawn equipments
customer_reviews.author: Hanson Webb

customer_reviews.title: An amazing spray! Used it to spary into a backpack ...
customer_reviews.text: An amazing spray! Used it to spary into a backpack blower that stopped running 5 years. A 5 second spray, 3 pulls on the rope n the blower now runs better than it did when it was new!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great LMT product but pricey
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing....follow the direction and use every few months. My equipment has been flawless for 3 years now. Good spark plug, airfilter, and clean gas in combo with this LMT product and you cant be stopped.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My lawn mower without this stuff - doesn't start My lawn mower with this stuff - starts, every time

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly amazing worked great on my old weed Eater thank u

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a champ! Follow the instructions and you won't be disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great stuff really keeps my mower and snow blower running good

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: yes, it worked U'll have 2 wait longer than 15 minutes Tho?
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great like it says. If you don't follow directions like I didn't, you might remove a spark plug, spray it in, put the spark plug back, then try to start it swinging the chainsaw blade into your shin, and then hop into the garage hoping the neighbors didn't see you. I took the spark plug back out, then pulled the starting cord a few times to clear it out before putting the spark plug back in, then it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Cliftons

customer_reviews.title: B'laster Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been looking for this product awhile, he bought it at a local store and was very pleased with it. When he tried buying it again, it was no where to be found. He was very excited that he was able to find it at Amazon. He claims it is a great product, works wonderfully, he uses it for the lawnmower and some of his other machinery. Glad we found it.
customer_reviews.author: CoriTex

customer_reviews.title: Blaster Lawn Mower Tune Up
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing on the market if you were like me and forgot to winterize your snowblower. A few sprays in the sparkplug tube and a few pulls later its started right up...
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Tune up in a bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really does work in my opinion. I have used it in all my 4 stroke small engines and it seems to improve overall preformance,Idle quality, faster starting and fuel efficiency! Definitely recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Llanos

customer_reviews.title: Does notable improvement to the several garden power-tool engines I ...
customer_reviews.text: Does notable improvement to the several garden power-tool engines I have. However it didn't fix the problem in my lawn-mover entirely: I had to disassemble and clean carburetor before the lawn-mover engine started working after it was sitting unused for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Alexei Khavaev

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Works
customer_reviews.text: A super simple way to get your lawn mover, line trimmer, edger and any other 2 stroke or 4 stroke powered garden tool in tip-top shape. I use it on all of my garden power equipment and it makes a noticeable difference. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: the berg

customer_reviews.title: Used product in the past with great results Great carbon remover it seems mowers always run ...
customer_reviews.text: Used product in the past with great results Great carbon remover it seems mowers always run better Just follow directions
customer_reviews.author: Big Wally

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my Briggs & Stratton mower
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bad lawn mower owner, and neglected to prep my mower for the winter season. This meant, when I needed to cut my grass in the summer, I had issues starting the mower. Rather than undo the carb and clean it, I thought I could simply spray this stuff into the mower, following the directions, and after 15 minutes, the mower would start up. I was expecting clouds of smoke, like the reviews stated, but instead, I got a mower that wouldnt start. While this product did not harm my mower, it didn't do anything to assist in starting it. I ended up rebuilding the carb, and the mower instantly started up. This stuff isnt magical.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Always had trouble with my old Lawn Boy push mower starting. Had to pull and pull and pull and it may start after numerous attempts. I used the Blaster Lawn Mower Tune Up and now it starts on the first or second pull every time. Work equally as well on my Homelite string trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: ras

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work every time but its a. 750 batting ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work every time but its a .750 batting average on keeping small engines away from a 60 buck a crack small engine guy.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for snow blowers, lawn mowers etc.
customer_reviews.text: My husband had been trying to locate this at Ames, Lowes and another place (can't remember the name) for quite a while. I finally got it on Amazon. Bought a can for our two sons and us. This is an amazing product!!! "Blaster Chemical Company Lawn Mower Tune Up"
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Small engine tune-up LMT
customer_reviews.text: Used it this weekend on my lawn equipment everything read to go for the summer season, now, I ran the machines for 20 minutes and now they start up first pull.
customer_reviews.author: J. F. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love my old toro (20+) years old) but had t o prime it about 8 times And pull about same in order to start it. Used this product and amazingly it starts on first pull even without priming it. This stuff really works great!
customer_reviews.author: Gary wadas

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: We spray this on the carb before each mow and it has kept our 6 year old mower running smoothly so far.
customer_reviews.author: Susan LaCombe

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I have ever used when a mower or weedeater etc sits up over the winter or a couple of years, this LMT will start it every time---I MEAN EVERY TIME !--just very hard to find
customer_reviews.author: Mike Williams

customer_reviews.title: 10 STARS Plus Product for a cheap price
customer_reviews.text: absolutely the best ever for mower, motorcycle, chainsaw, generator, chainsaw etc. tune up. I would give it 10 STARS Plus if you had more stars displayed..
customer_reviews.author: karin deck

customer_reviews.title: Tune-up in a can
customer_reviews.text: My ten year old mower was running pretty rough after sitting for another long Winter. I used B'laster and replaced the spark plug and now it's back to starting on the first pull. No need to rebuild the carb or bring to the shop for an annual service. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: James K. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: As stated by other reviewers, this product really works. Use as directed and you will have a much improved running engine. Just a word on the service from Supreme Hardware: fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: K. Floy

product_meta.title: B'laster 16-SET Advanced Small Engine Tune-Up - 11-Ounces
product_meta.description: Size:Case of 1B'laster Small Engine Tune-Up is formulated to assist in the preventative maintenance of all two and four-cycle combustion engines. It dissipates moisture and inhibits rust and frees rings and valves, restoring compression, power and vacuum.
feature_bullets: Restores Power to All Small Engines
For Sure Starts after Seasonal Storage
